localize.title: Buzzing on The Economist
localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: “There's a real strong streak of sexism and misogyny...one has to just accept, you're just not really all that interesting to them.” Former White House Russia adviser Fiona Hill recalls her meetings with the Kremlin on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/mrbj2msmAv
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: "性别歧视和厌女症的倾向真的很强烈......人们不得不接受，你对他们来说并不是真的那么有趣。" 前白宫俄罗斯顾问菲奥娜-希尔（Fiona Hill）在 "经济学家问 "播客https://t.co/mrbj2msmAv，回忆了她与克里姆林宫的会面。
"性別歧視和厭女症的傾向真的很強烈......人們不得不接受，你對他們來說並不是真的那麼有趣。" 前白宮俄羅斯顧問菲奧娜-希爾（Fiona Hill）在 "經濟學家問 "播客https://t.co/mrbj2msmAv，回憶了她與克里姆林宮的會面。

previous.title: America's House of Representatives has passed the stimulus bill. It enjoys broad support among Americans, including a plurality of Republicans https://t.co/snbUseLBKF

localize.full_text: 美国众议院已经通过了经济刺激法案。该法案在美国人中得到广泛支持，包括共和党人的多数支持https://t.co/snbUseLBKF。
美國衆議院已經通過了經濟刺激法案。該法案在美國人中得到廣泛支持，包括共和黨人的多數支持https://t.co/snbUseLBKF。

next.title: How serious a risk does Russia pose to America? Fiona Hill, a Russia specialist at @BrookingsInst, tells @AnneMcElvoy why Russia is “a threat to the cohesion of Western democracies” on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/4vcqJHC2nR

localize.full_text: 俄罗斯对美国构成的风险有多严重？在《经济学家问》播客https://t.co/4vcqJHC2nR，@布鲁金斯学院的俄罗斯专家Fiona Hill告诉@AnneMcElvoy，为什么俄罗斯是 "对西方民主国家凝聚力的威胁"。
俄羅斯對美國構成的風險有多嚴重？在《經濟學家問》播客https://t.co/4vcqJHC2nR，@布魯金斯學院的俄羅斯專家Fiona Hill告訴@AnneMcElvoy，爲什麼俄羅斯是 "對西方民主國家凝聚力的威脅"。
